inclusion.criterion: pancreas cancer by cytology or histology
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: biopsy was consistent with pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas

exclusion.criterion: women of childbearing potential or their sexual partners who are unwilling to employ adequate contraception
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: use of an investigational agent for pain control concurrently or within the past 30 days
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: receipt of radiation to the abdomen for any reason during the planned 10-day treatment time
exclusion.label: unknown
